Given this: angular.module( 'myModule', [ ] )       .service( 'myService', (function() {          var message = 'Message one!',              getMessage = function()               {                  return this.message;              };                        this.message = 'Message two!';          this.getMessage = function() {             return message;           };                    return function() {            return {                      getMessage  : getMessage,                      message     : 'Message three!'                   };          };                  })()) Which message will be returned by injecting this service and executing 'myService.getMessage()'?
